Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Nova.help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.targetHelp: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Crystal_of_Vigor.help: When a Brute minion is in peril, he can release the power in his crystal to give himself and all his nearby allies a buff to their damage.
Crystal_of_Vigor.targetHelp: When a Brute minion is in peril, he can release the power in his crystal to give himself and all his nearby allies a buff to their damage.

Crystal_of_Corruption.help: Ruladak has weakened you and reduced your Damage, your Damage Resistance, and your Defense.
Crystal_of_Corruption.targetHelp: Ruladak has weakened you and reduced your Damage, your Damage Resistance, and your Defense.
